summary: Provides utility classes and helper functions to safely handle potentially unsafe byte and text values within Ansible, offering safe decoding/encoding and transparent wrapping of mappings, sequences, and sets so that these values can be processed reliably in templating and module execution.
business_intent: Enable Ansible to work with variables that may contain non‑UTF‑8 or otherwise unsafe data without raising errors, preserving data integrity and preventing security issues during variable interpolation and module operations.
